entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
